Package Lab1Starter

Class GameCharacter

java.lang.Object
Lab1Starter.GameCharacter
Direct Known Subclasses:
NonPlayerCharacter
public class GameCharacter extends Object
This is the base GameCharacter object from which all other characters will be derived.
Version:
1.3 Lab1 CS131ON
Author:
Rob Kelley

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Description
    GameCharacter()
    The empty argument constructor generates an ID by calling a static method from the GameUtilities class
    GameCharacter(String uniqueID, String personality)
    This constructor allows the caller to pass in the uniqueID for the object.
